type.name: standard
type.summary:
Williams Fractal is a retrospective price pattern that identifies a central high or low point over a lookback window.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of span periods to the left and right of the evaluation period.
Determines use of Close or High/Low wicks for points.
type.returns: Time series of Williams Fractal Bull/Bear values.

type.name: alt
type.summary:
Williams Fractal is a retrospective price pattern that identifies a central high or low point over a lookback window.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of span periods to the left of the evaluation period.
Number of span periods to the right of the evaluation period.
Determines use of Close or High/Low wicks for points.
type.returns: Time series of Williams Fractal Bull/Bear values.
